text: Hagi korapama Amaleki vahera Israeli vahe'mo'zama zamahe vagarazageno osi'a naga'ma koro frezama ana kazigama umani'naza vahera Simioni naga'mo'za ome zamahe vagare'za ana mopafi mani'za e'za ama knarera menina ehanati'naze.4:43 Ama knarerema hu'neana, ama meni tagri knafinkura osu'neanki korapa knafinku hu'naze.
